alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Yuma County through 530 PM MST... At 438 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Paloma to near Mohawk to 25 miles south of Dateland. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dateland, Tacna, Tyson, Mohawk and Roll. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 38 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County
